text: Ocean Pictures is an Indian film production and distribution company based in Malayalam film industry. It was founded in 2017 by Naseeb BR and Sanu S Nair. The head office is located in Thiruvananthapuram, India. Though the company was established after the release of 2 Penkuttikal, the movie is considered as its first production venture. ==Films== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Title !! Director !! Cast !!
